name: agave
content:
Add to word list

[ C or U ] a plant that grows in the hot, dry parts of the southern US and South America. There are many different types of agave and the plants have thick long or rounded leaves with sharp points on them, and tall flowers: Agaves come in numerous shapes, sizes, and colours. A glut of agave has made the plant almost worthless. Compare
century plant
Videowok_art/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ U ] a thick, sweet liquid produced from the centre of the agave plant, used for making food taste sweeter: Honey or agave would work well in this recipe. The agave gives the salad dressing that little bit of sweetness. Synonym
agave nectar
